0: The bathroom wall design is weird

the style of the room the darkness of the bathroom the LOBBY was beautiful but the room left something to the imagination old carpet dated technology and the room phones and the windows were nice but you could not open windows to get air
Price for room service were ok
And as other reviewers have noted the bathroom is about the size of a box of tic tacs
Our room was above the delivery bays and along a street car route clack of the tracks and ding ding ding of the trolley
Then the room we got was really far way we had to walk about 5 minutes to get in and out of the hotel
No hot water in the shower or bath
Hotel was sprawling could n’t get 2 rooms in same vicinity despite booking 8 months ahead
I would stay here again but would request a room away from the traffic side of the hotel
1: Our room was up on the 4th in a corner and was a great size with modern decor and furniture
Hotel was clean and room had everything we needed
The room was spacious and had the amenities we needed

I chose this hotel for it is location and then I read some reviews that were not positive but on arrival I was very happy fabulous location very present staff the hotel was spotless easy check in our king room was massive very clean and up to date showers are great not a thing wrong don t listen to the negative reviews it is a great hotel in an ideal location
My wife booked us through “ express deals ” on Expedia which gave us a room for 80
The room had a nice city view
Staff are friendly and helpful and rooms are nice
Recommend this hotel if you ’re looking for a great location super nice beds very clean rooms with friendly and helpful staff
I had a good view from my window and very bright in the room
The location is great but room street noise in the morning not so great
